posts.postText:
Name: Axle

ID: STEAM_0:1:22916301

Reason: RDM 

Length: 5hours

Server: TTT

Banner: Kobold

Unban Reason: although it is 5hours i dont expect you to undo it. but, i wasnt RDM'ing, i was detective and got shot, thats y i killed him, and as soon as they yelled RDM in the next round i got kicked :/ 

would like more of an insight. ty

Someone threw a smoke bomb, immediately after which the damage logs show you shooting me a few times, so I killed the guy that wasnt detective and he turned out inno. Then you mowed me down, after which the guy next to me walked up and you shot him down too. Somewhere else in the round you rdmed another inno as well.

This is all I got from it, btw you were banned for 24 hours, not 5.

[NNJG] Kobold: He's banned for 24 hours for rdming as a detective.
[NNJG] Kobold: Everyone in the server told me to ban him upon him joining, and damagelogs confirmed.
No bans under 1441 minutes will be removed. Locked.
